list.name: BERSERKER
list.description: When Bull falls below x% health, his reload speed doubles!
list.descriptionHtml: When Bull falls below x% health, his reload speed doubles!

list.name: TOUGH-GUY
list.description: When Bull falls below x% health, he gains a shield that reduces all damage he takes by x%.
